mapper.select: SELECT "1" financeKind, c.id AS prdtId, c.bank_name AS financeName, c.card_name AS prdtName, c.card_image AS image, c.conn_status FROM card c WHERE c.member_id = #{memberIdx} GROUP BY c.id, financeName, c.card_name, c.card_image UNION ALL SELECT "2" as financeKind, a.id AS prdtId, a.bank_name AS financeName, a.account_name AS prdtName, a.account_book_image AS image, a.conn_status FROM account_book a WHERE a.member_id = #{memberIdx} GROUP BY a.id, financeName, a.account_name, a.account_book_image;
